page.title: 04Life of a Wroxall engineer.
page.content: My dad is an engineer.His firm takes old machines and strips them down, salvages the good parts,re-furbishes and re-conditions them.They usually have a stock of 20-30 machines.His firm manufacture spares when they are not quickly available.At the moment he is working on a "A4" model 1250 "multilith" press. He has been an engineer for 22 years and has worked as a motor mechanic,radio and T.V.engineer,radio officer in the merchant navy,a radar engineer and a print technician. The biggest changes since he has been working are computerisation, miniaturisation and increased productivity and reliability. He works from Mondays to Saturdays and occasionally Sundays.He goes to work at 8:30 a.m. and he has dinner at 1 pm.
